reviews.review: i hated every second I have put into this god forsaken game. my entire friend group was tormented by this game. by the mere mention of Counter-Strike: Global Offensive, my friends refuse to take me seriously. how can a game be this not fun to play. It's literally free to play now and it's not worth the price. i should be payed to play this, but even then, all the money in the world wouldn't convince me to dive into this cesspool of a video game with the human scum that makes up the community, if it even can be called that. my friend got so made that he popped an artery in his head. he wasnt even mad from dying, the severity of how bad this game is caused him to convulse and explode in anger and fecal matter. He survived, but at what cost, he still has the memory of playing this game. 3/5 stars

cs go er en værdig aftager til cs  1,6 og meget bedre end source..  
desværre et kæmpe problem at servere konstant er fyldt med russere og tyrkere, som med deres toxic sprog og snyderier belaster troen på spillets eksistens.. snyderne på face it er meget færre og det må da være muligt at gøre det bedre for de trofaste og betalende ikke snydende spillere...
No ogólnie fajna ale jak trafi się na ruska to wkuriwa tylko
This game is pretty good but I warn you. If you have a low trust factor or if you dont have prime prepare to deal with hackers galore.
All people should play this game. You can create groups and all kinda stuffs. Its really funny. I hope you like it and enjoy the game!

Muitos jogadores usando os famosos ''cheaters" pra se dar bem no jogo, e a fiscalização é horrível, não se preocupam em banir esses tipo de jogadores e muito menos em criar medidas eficazes para que diminuam esses tipos de coisa.
В последнее время эта игра, только для бустеров, и читеров.

nie polecam gry. system losuje nie rowno graczy z timingem konta "300h" wylosuje Tobie graczy z 2000godzin przegranych i wiecej wiec albo losuje tak zwanych "supreme" dobrych graczy vs Ty albo dzieciarnie ktora w twojej druzynie idze afk nie ogarnia totalnie tej gry albo gdy juz znajdzie CI ten "dream team" to grasz vs cheater :) super nie ? :) wiec na 10 meczy 2 wygrywasz :) i po dniu grania jestes wkur*** zdenerwowany :)
